settings.backups.fileBackup.popup2.conte: It's important that this password is secure, because it protects your data and your funds.
We do not store this password, and cannot help you recover it!
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup2.title: your password
settings.backups.fileBackup.title: backups
settings.backups.fileBackup.toRestore: to restore your Peach account & wallet
settings.backups.seedPhrase.noDigital: don't store your seed phrase digitally
settings.backups.seedPhrase.noPictures: never take pictures or screenshots of your seed phrase
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.text.1: A seed phrase is a random collection of 12 words that you can use to recover the funds on your Peach wallet in case of an emergency.
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.text.2: We do not store this seed phrase, and cannot help you recover it!
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.title: seed phrase?
settings.backups.seedPhrase.storeSafely:
store it in a secure location,
 like a safe or a lockbox
settings.backups.seedPhrase.writeItDown: write it down on a piece of paper
settings.backups.subtitle: backups
settings.bitcoinProducts.proSecurity.des: We use the open source bitbox to secure our own funds at Peach. That's why we recommend it to you as well!
You can use code PEACH for a 5% discount.
settings.deleteAccount.deleted.title: bye - bye data
settings.deleteAccount.forRealsies:
For realsies. 
No backup or no password = data gone!
settings.deleteAccount.popup:
Without your backup AND your password, you will not be able to regain access to your account!

For more information take a look at our privacy policy at https://peachbitcoin.com/privacy-policy
settings.deleteAccount.popup.title: delete account?
settings.deleteAccount.success: We hope to see you back soon!
settings.deleteAccount.success.title: account deleted
settings.deleteAccount.title: All your data will be wiped! Make sure you have a backup.

settings.fees.point.1: the bitcoin network fee for the payout
settings.fees.point.2: any fees you pay for using your selected payment method
settings.fees.text.2: of the total amount of the trade.
settings.fees.text.3: This excludes any other fees and markups, which may include:
settings.language.subtitle: display language
settings.missingPermissions.text:
Peach needs your permission to use your camera.

You can change this in the settings of your phone.
settings.networkFees.help:
These are the fees you pay to the bitcoin network in case of a refund or for transactions from your wallet. These fees change over time, depending on how busy it is.

The busier the network, the more you'll need to pay to get a quick confirmation.
settings.networkFees.payoutInfo: This setting does not apply to payouts. See transaction batching for more information.
settings.notifications.popup:
Without notifications, you'll not be informed when there's a match. 

Taking a long time to match someone back will negatively impact your reputation score.
settings.notifications.popup.title: turn off notifications?
settings.paymentMethods.subtitle: payment methods
settings.payoutAddress.popup.content: Do you want to remove this custom wallet?
settings.payoutAddress.popup.title: remove wallet?
settings.payoutAddress.title: set custom address
settings.referrals.customReferralCode.po: Your custom referral code {refCode} is now active!
Let's get creative! Having a custom referral code is a lot more fun than all those numbers, right?
settings.referrals.noPeachFees.popup.suc: The free trading powerup is active. Let's get to it!
settings.referrals.noPeachFees.popup.tex:
Look, we like money. But we like you even more <3

By activating this powerup, you don't pay any Peach fees your next two trades.

The bigger those trades, the more you save!
settings.refundAddress.title: set custom refund address
